nodes.text: Lake Anre was a prehistoric lake on the planet Tatooine which ran all the way to the Northern Dune Sea desert via underground tributaries. The lake eventually dried up, and its bed was left as a region of desert that became known as the Hutt Flats.

Lake Anre was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I, which was written by Kristin Lund and released in 2000. It was confirmed to be canon by the sourcebook Star Wars: Complete Locations, which was released in 2016.
